00027 // String conversions (all python functions uses always chars)
00028 // ---------------------------------------------------------
00029 
00030 #if wxUSE_UNICODE
00031         #define WX2PY(x)                (wxString(x).mb_str(wxConvUTF8).data())
00032 #else
00033         #define WX2PY(x)                (wxString(x).mb_str(wxConvUTF8))
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 #define PY2WX(x)                        (wxString(x, wxConvUTF8))
00037 
00038 
00039 #define PYSTRING2WX(x)          (PY2WX(PyString_AsString(x)))
00040 #define WX2PYSTRING(x)          (PyString_FromString(WX2PY(x))

00046 class wxScriptFunctionPython : public wxScriptFunction
00047 {
00048 protected:
00049 
00051         PyObject *m_pDict;
00052 
00054         PyObject *m_pFunc;
00055 
00056 protected:
00057 
00059         PyObject *CreatePyObjFromScriptVar(const wxScriptVar &toconvert) const;
00060 
00062         wxScriptVar CreatePyObjFromScriptVar(PyObject *toconvert) const;
00063 
00064 public:
00065 
00068         wxScriptFunctionPython(const wxString &name = wxEmptyString,
00069                                                 PyObject *dictionary = NULL, PyObject *func = NULL);
00070 
00071         virtual wxScriptFunction *Clone() const {
00072                 wxScriptFunction *newf = new wxScriptFunctionPython();
00073                 newf->DeepCopy(this);
00074                 return newf;
00075         }
00076 
00077         virtual void DeepCopy(const wxScriptFunction *tocopy) {
00078                 wxScriptFunctionPython *pf = (wxScriptFunctionPython *)tocopy;
00079                 m_pDict = pf->m_pDict;
00080                 m_pFunc = pf->m_pFunc;
00081                 wxScriptFunction::DeepCopy(tocopy);
00082         }
00083 
00084         void Set(const wxString &name, PyObject *dictionary, PyObject *function);
00085         virtual bool Exec(wxScriptVar &ret, wxScriptVar *arg) const;
00086 };

00092 class wxScriptFilePython : public wxScriptFile
00093 {
00094 public:
00095         wxScriptFilePython(const wxString &toload = wxEmptyString) {            
00096                 m_tScriptFile = wxPYTHON_SCRIPTFILE;
00097                 if (!toload.IsEmpty())
00098                         Load(toload);
00099         }
00100 
00101         virtual bool Load(const wxString &filename);
00102 };
